name: CORE (itch) (CORE)
description:
Here is the story!You are a Space Marine. Killing demons that have invaded Earth! You need to stop them by Shutting the Portal and killing the hell Cristest. You are at a Special Science force that is Researching on Portals. Some people are doing it in hell, YES HELL. They used a portal to go there but something went wrong, demons killed the scientist and went through  the portal and they are telling the hell cristest to go through it. You, the Space marine Sometimes call yourself, "THE MANBER" Needs to stop the portals and kill the hell priest that opens portals, also kill the hell cristest the revives the hell priest. Good Luck!

3D Batch File Game. 2 Chapters. 4 Levels each. Also, a little bit of story too!
